definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]

sentences.english: Tell your friends and relatives about Excellent's free mortgage referral and consulting services.
sentences.chinese: 告诉你的亲友们有关卓誉的免费按揭转介及谘询服务。

sentences.english: How many psychologists does it take to change a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 要多少个谘商心理师才能换掉一个灯泡？

sentences.english: Therapy and counseling can cure compulsive lying.
sentences.chinese: 而强迫性说谎是可以借由心理疗法及谘商来治疗。

sentences.english: Pregnant ladies are advised to consult the doctor prior to the examination.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕妇女检查前必须向医生谘询意見。

sentences.english: They presented a note of apology to the Foreign Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 外交部经过谘商后给予核准。

sentences.english: Hence the interval between consultations does not go unused.
sentences.chinese: 因此，谘商节数之间，稍加间隔，并非没有用途。

sentences.english: Moreover We've kept the price close to the costs of production.
sentences.chinese: 再说，张谘经把价格压到生产费用的边缘了。

sentences.english: The consultant was a man who had many unanswered questions.
sentences.chinese: 这个男性谘询者有许多待解的问题。

sentences.english: We also consult with and advise other members of the healthcare team.
sentences.chinese: 我们也向医疗团队里的其它成员进行谘商及建议。

sentences.english: You can go to the information desk to ask for more reference.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去谘询台要更多参考资料。

sentences.english: The IIAC plans to publish its first report in March 1998.
sentences.chinese: 该谘询委员会计划在一九九八年三月发表首份报告。

sentences.english: How do you know about this consultative scheme?
sentences.chinese: 你从何途径认识本谘询计划？

sentences.english: He is no longer the superior wisdom, judge, and counselor.
sentences.chinese: 心理治疗师不再是优越的智者，判断者，及谘商师。

sentences.english: Teleconsultation is the application of the telemedicine.
sentences.chinese: 远距谘商是远距医疗的一种应用。

definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
to arrange in ordered fashion/also pr. [qin1]
to contribute to a feast/to pool (money)
